Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC15Pr.name: setupShadow(colour:opacity:offset:radius:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC15Pr.abstract: Setup the shadow layer of this UIView.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC15Pr.name: setupGradient(colors:locations:orientation:customBounds:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC15Pr.abstract: Setup a gradient layer or override an existing gradient layer with the given colors, locations, orientation and an optional customBound.

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC15.name: rgba(_:_:_:_:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC15.abstract: Returns a UIColor instance for the given RGBA color values.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS15Productivi.name: titleized()
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS15Productivi.abstract: Format the string into a Title Case format.

Extensions/NSMutableAttributedString.htm.name: format(with:)
Extensions/NSMutableAttributedString.htm.abstract: Replaces all String format specifiers with the given arguments while keeping their styles.
